backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor serving as a placeholder backend with no implemented functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting three implemented features: scheduling page with service request form, Schedule Service navigation link, and logo replacement with confidence levels and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend files describing components, pages, styling, and routing for the R Irrigation website.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with OKLCH color system defining light and dark theme variables for the design system.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with root div and module script reference to main.tsx for the React application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React application with TanStack Router configuration defining all routes (home, services, areas, reviews, contact, schedule, city pages) wrapped in Header/Footer layout.
frontend/src/components/CTABlock.tsx: Call-to-action section component with prominent phone number, Schedule Online, and Request Free Estimate buttons in gradient background.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component with contact information, service areas list, estimate request form with state management, and caffeine.ai attribution.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Sticky header with R Irrigation logo, responsive navigation menu including Schedule Service link, phone number, Get Free Estimate CTA, and mobile menu toggle.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Hero section component with headline, CTA buttons (call, schedule, estimate), and trust indicators for a sprinkler/irrigation service business in Northern NJ.
frontend/src/components/ReviewsSection.t: Displays three customer testimonials in a card grid layout with 5-star ratings and location information.
frontend/src/components/ServiceAreaSecti: Shows service coverage areas with Clifton as primary location and lists cities in Bergen and Passaic counties with a link to view all areas.
frontend/src/components/ServicesGrid.tsx: Grid of six service cards (repair, installation, startup, winterization, leak detection, upgrades) with icons and descriptions.
frontend/src/components/WhyChooseUs.tsx: Four-column benefit section highlighting fast service, experienced technicians, reliable work, and local Northern NJ expertise with icons.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and manages an ICP backend actor, handling both authenticated and anonymous identities with automatic query invalidation on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, identity persistence, and AuthClient lifecycle.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file for React Query hooks that would interact with the backend.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables defining a water/lawn themed color palette (blue primary, green secondary) for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query and Internet Identity providers, then renders the App component.
frontend/src/pages/CliftonNJ.tsx: Location-specific landing page for Clifton, NJ featuring sprinkler repair services, benefits, and a prominent call-to-action with phone number (973) 955-8340.
frontend/src/pages/Contact.tsx: Contact page with business information (phone, email, service area, hours) and a form for requesting free estimates with fields for name, phone, email, service type, and message.
frontend/src/pages/HackensackNJ.tsx: Location-specific landing page for Hackensack, NJ highlighting sprinkler service offerings including maintenance, repairs, and seasonal services with local benefits.
frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx: Main homepage component that composes six sections: HeroSection, WhyChooseUs, ServicesGrid, ServiceAreaSection, ReviewsSection, and CTABlock.
frontend/src/pages/ParamusNJ.tsx: Location-specific landing page for Paramus, NJ showcasing comprehensive irrigation services including design, installation, maintenance, and smart technology upgrades.
frontend/src/pages/Reviews.tsx: Customer reviews page displaying nine 5-star testimonials from various Northern NJ locations with service types, customer names, and detailed feedback.
frontend/src/pages/Schedule.tsx: Service scheduling form page with validation for contact info, service type, date/time selection, and success confirmation screen after submission.
frontend/src/pages/ServiceAreas.tsx: Service areas page listing Clifton as primary location with Bergen County and Passaic County cities, some with dedicated detail page links.
frontend/src/pages/Services.tsx: Services overview page displaying six irrigation services (repair, installation, startup, winterization, leak detection, upgrades) with icons, descriptions, and detail lists.
frontend/src/pages/WayneNJ.tsx: SEO-optimized city page for Wayne, NJ featuring sprinkler repair services, benefits list, prominent phone CTA, and local service messaging.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom OKLCH color system, container settings, extended theme properties, and animation utilities.
project_state.json: Project metadata tracking R Irrigation website features, architecture notes, color scheme (deep blue/bright green), and completed feature implementations.
